page.title: 01A DESCRIPTION OF OUR AREA
page.content: {We}live in a place which is mostly fields, woods and steep hills. The woods have lots of{wildlife}including deer. There are quite a few farms. {There}are two main villages,{Chicklade and{Hindon.}A very busy road has been built right through Chicklade. Hindon used to be on a very busy road until they built the new road. Hindon is very quiet. It has a pub called the {Lamb}which has a lot of visitors including foreign tourists. The food is said to be good there. We are close to{Salisbury Plain, {Stonehenge}and{Longleat. Shaftesbury, which is not far from us, was used to film a Hovis bread advertisement because it has a very steep cobbled street which is pretty. Hindon was built in the 13th century and was quite important until the rail ways came to Tisbury.
